  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:K315_1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>K315_1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">Becoming a critical social work practitioner</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein kritischer Sozialarbeit Praktiker werden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Devenant un praticien social critique de travail</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transformando-se um practitioner social crítico 
do trabalho</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Transformandosi in un professionista sociale 
critico del lavoro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γίνοντας κρίσιμος κοινωνικός επαγγελματίας εργασίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Haciendo un médico social crítico del trabajo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">What does it take to become a critical practitioner in social work? This unit will guide you through some important concepts. An understanding of ‘critical perspectives’ will help you take a positive and constructive approach to problems that arise in social work practice.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Health and Lifestyle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">care_and_control</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">complex_relationships</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">professional_discretion</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was nimmt sie, um einem kritischen Praktiker in 
der Sozialarbeit zu stehen? Diese Maßeinheit führt Sie durch 
einige wichtige Konzepte. Ein Verständnis von?critical 
Perspektiven? hilft Ihnen, eine positive und konstruktive 
Annäherung zu den Problemen zu nehmen, die in der Sozialarbeit Praxis
entstehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Que prend-il pour aller bien à un praticien 
critique dans le travail social ? Cette unité vous guidera par 
quelques concepts importants. Un arrangement des perspectives 
?critical ? vous aidera à adopter une approche positive et 
constructive aux problèmes qui surgissent dans la pratique en 
matière sociale de travail.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que faz exame para assentar bem em um practitioner
crítico no trabalho social? Esta unidade guiá-lo-á com alguns
conceitos importantes. Uma compreensão de 
perspectives?critical? ajudar-lhe-á fazer exame de uma 
aproximação positiva e constructive aos problemas que se levantam na
prática social do trabalho.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa prende per stare bene ad un 
professionista critico nel lavoro sociale? Questa unità li 
guiderà con alcuni concetti importanti. Una comprensione delle 
prospettive?critical? li aiuterà ad adottare un metodo positivo
e costruttivo ai problemi che presentano nella pratica sociale del 
lavoro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τι παίρνει για να γίνει κρίσιμος επαγγελματίας στην 
κοινωνική εργασία; Αυτή η μονάδα θα σας καθοδηγήσει μέσω 
μερικών σημαντικών εννοιών. Μια κατανόηση των ?critical 
προοπτικών; θα σας βοηθήσει να υιοθετήσετε μια θετική και 
εποικοδομητική μέθοδο στα προβλήματα που προκύπτουν στην 
κοινωνική πρακτική εργασίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Qué toma para sentir bien a un médico crítico 
en trabajo social? Esta unidad le dirigirá con algunos 
conceptos importantes. ¿Una comprensión de 
perspectivas?critical? le ayudará a llevar un acercamiento 
positivo y constructivo los problemas que se presentan en práctica 
social del trabajo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesundheit und Lebensstil</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">care_and_control</string>
